entry.title: Accidentally Yours
entry.summary:
Author: Anotherfanfic89

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,662Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: Just me using the characters from 911 for my own amusement. New to writing fanfiction, but I've always enjoyed writing in general. Okay, so, Buck is a paramedic in this and it's a new way he meets Eddie and Chris. I plan on making is cute and full of so much sweet with a splash of drama from time to time. Yeah, I can already tell I suck at summaries. The first chapter is short, but it's just because I'm testing all this out.

entry.title: Something Just Like This
entry.summary:
Author: penpen_xo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,780Chapters: 5/12Kudos: 20

Summary: “We have a vacancy, Buck,” Eddie shook his head. “And she’s really nice.” “Maybe that’s the problem!” Buck shot back, an awful bite to his tone that he hated himself for immediately. Buck shuddered slightly as he felt Eddie's hand slip into his and give it a squeeze. “Talk to me Buck.” He pleaded. “It’s stupid.” Buck mumbled. “It isn’t if it’s bothering you this much, you’re almost acting like-” Eddie prompted, realisation setting in all of a sudden, his eyes softening completely as he understood. “You’re scared?”   or   The 118 gain a new Probie and Buck is anything but pleased, determined more than ever to keep them at arms length.He just got Eddie and Christopher back in his life and life at the 118 is finally starting to settle, and he just can't handle any more changes.What he doesn't realise is that he and probationary firefighter Rosie Bishop actually have an awful lot in common.   Buddie beginnings + firefam feels, as the team heals and learns to open their hearts again, helping a young girl find her place in a very lonely world along the way.

entry.title: S2 Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,550Chapters: 7/12Kudos: 65

Summary: “I know we haven’t been having that best of luck with partners for you yet, but I think today could really go well Buck.” Bobby says, catching her in between jobs. “Let me guess, I’m meeting him tomorrow whether I like it or not and it’s going to take us less than an hour to realise he’s a misogynist.” “Oh, are we better on Buck’s new work partner again, I bet he doesn’t even last through the first call with her.” Chimney says, Kleenex bottle in hand. “That’s rude Chim, I’ve run the maths and the average is at least two calls, give him that.” Kara responds much to Bobby’s charging. “How about you both give the new guy a chance, he’s fully fresh.” “Wait! Cap you’re giving me a Probie.” TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.

entry.title: Enable Push Notifications
entry.summary:
Author: tired_transmasc

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,414Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 16

Summary: Ravi is sick and tired of Buck's ranting and raving about Eddie and decides enough is enough. Upon finding out that Buck is currently active on Grindr, him and Hen plot to drive Buck crazy by playing the infamous Grindr alert throughout the shift and gaslight him about hearing it themselves. What starts as a simple prank quickly backfires when Eddie unintentionally gets pulled in, and is forced to talk to Buck about his own recent self-discoveries. ~~ Eddie sighed deeply, pinching the bridge of his nose, "Dios, Buck, I already told you that you probably just heard someone else's phone going off." "And I'm telling you, there's no way it could be!" Buck exclaimed, his voice getting slightly too loud in the headsets that Ravi flinched at the suddenness. "How on earth could you know that?" Eddie shot back. "I just do, Eds!" Buck's cheeks started to tint pink, "So either there's a very specific kind of ghost haunting the station-" Eddie rolled his eyes at that, "-or I need to schedule an appointment with a mental health professional."

entry.title: just ask josh
entry.summary:
Author: madforyou

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 68,815Chapters: 12/14Kudos: 847

Summary: Chim is reading aloud before Buck can lunge across the counter and stop him, “I’d beg so loud they’d all know exactly what you—” His eyebrows climb to his hairline, “Buck, what the fuck?” Ravi bursts out laughing, nearly doubling over, “Wait, you sexted the group chat?!” “No, no, no—” Buck’s voice traitorously cracks and he can feel the heat in his face, “That’s not—I didn’t—” Hen’s tone sharpens, amusement undercut with curiosity, “You’re seeing someone? Who is she?” Or,Three months of secret hookups with Eddie and Buck manages to blow it all with one wrong text.

entry.title: I love you (I'm sorry)
entry.summary:
Author: TheRealBagelGod

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,294Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 68

Summary: Whumptober 2025 - Day Twenty-Six - Relapse   One thousand seven-hundred and fifteen days. He used to be proud of that number. This morning, when it still mattered. He used to feel pride every morning when the number went up. Another day gone. Passed without him cutting himself open in a desperate attempt to- god, he doesn’t even know why he did it anymore. Or… does it. No. No, this was a one time thing. Just a little slip, but he still had his grip. He wasn’t going to fall any further down the self-mutilating slope. That’s what he told himself as he washed his blood down the drain. That’s what he told himself when he didn’t bandage his arm. That’s what he told himself when he stopped wearing short sleeves. That’s what he kept telling himself every night when he reopened more of his scars.

entry.title: Too Close For Comfort
entry.summary:
Author: chenfordsbuddies

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,033Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: "It was the small things at first. The way his laugh lit up the room, the way he was the only one that truly knew me, the way that shirt hugs him in just the right places, and the way that he was the only one that could calm me down." He ticked down his fingers as he went on, and Buck couldn't help but wonder how those things led to falling in love. Like, he thought all those things about Eddie, but he wasn't in love with him. Did he love him? Yeah, but not like that. Strictly platonic. OR/ When the 118 responds to a call involving a gay couple, Buck is tasked with keeping one of the men calm while the other is taken care of. And he asks him to tell him their love story.

entry.title: Never a Frown (With Golden Brown)
entry.summary:
Author: ratking_withnotail

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,267Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 302

Summary: Percy Jackson was excited—genuinely excited—for the first time in what felt like years. A new city. A new name. A new face, even. The golden hair, the pale blue eyes, the tattoos that traced his skin like constellations—none of it screamed “Percy Jackson” anymore. He was Evan Buckley now, or just Buck, depending on who asked. He’d keep busy—physically exhausted, mentally occupied, emotionally detached. That was the key. No attachments. No friendships. No relationships. No vulnerability. He’d learned the hard way that getting close to people only ended in pain. Either they died, betrayed him, or saw the legend behind the name and stopped seeing him altogether.Unfortunately, he hadn’t planned on the 118.

entry.summary:
Author: thefuzzzz

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,135Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 89

Summary: "Is this a bad idea?" Eddie hummed, currently holding a roller coated in paint an inch away from the wall. Buck shrugged. "Nah. You wanted this." "Yeah, when I was half asleep." "Exactly when all your best ideas happen." --------------- Eddie had picked up a habit of bugging Buck when they were supposed to be sleeping with mindless, late-night quandaries. Buck wasn't as upset about this as he should have been, mainly because it was the only time he could weasel what Eddie really wanted out of him.

entry.title: Behind Blue (and Brown) Eyes
entry.summary:
Author: Supernaturaltwink1

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,074Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 8

Summary: The moment Buck realizes he has feelings for Eddie, he knows it's over for him. Only when Eddie talks to Maddie does he realize he loves Buck back and has to stop Tommy from making a move before he never has a chance to tell Buck how he truly feels about him.  Or Eddie realizes that he loves Buck, and before Tommy can make a move on his soulmate, Eddie has to come up with a way to tell Buck without ruining their friendship.TW: Tommy Kinard

entry.title: How To Lose a Firefighter In Ten Days Off
entry.summary:
Author: Buddie_Butterflies

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,751Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 25

Summary: He walks past them and sits at the bar to order a round of shots, figuring that coming into the group that way might be a good icebreaker. He hasn’t ordered yet when he hears behind him, “Thanks for the shot.” he turns to see Captain Diaz standing by him, and Buck is confused “You're talking to me, Captain Diaz.” Buck smiles, trying to assess the situation. “It’s Eddie, and yes, you're the only one to buy me a shot.” He tells him, and Buck smiles. “Really, no one brought you a drink? I am surprised,” Buck says honestly. “Why is that, Buck?” Eddie asks, leaning against the counter. Was this man actually flirting with him? “Have you looked in the mirror, Diaz. Does anyone call you that?" Buck leans in. “Not if they want me to answer.” Eddie takes a sip of his beer, and Buck can’t take his eyes off him. “I look in mirrors every day, your point?” he shrugs and stares back. “You do know how beautiful you are, right?” Buck lays the charm on thick. “Is your full name Eduardo?”     OR How To Lose A Guy in Ten Days: Firefight Edition- loosely based on it, these two are so in love with each other and can't admit it.
